mapper.select:
select a.*,b.ROUTER_COND_NAME,c.SER_MTD_CNM,c.SER_MTD_ENM from ECM_SERV_RULE a LEFT JOIN ECM_ROUTER_COND b on a.ROUTER_COND_ID = b.ROUTER_COND_ID, ECM_SER_MTDINFO c where a.SER_MTD_ID = c.SER_MTD_ID
AND SERV_RULE_TYPE = #{baseParam.servRuleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.*,b.ROUTER_COND_OPER,b.ROUTER_COND_VAL,c.SER_MTD_ENM,e.ROUTER_COL_CDN,e.ROUTER_COL_TYPE,f.APP_SER_CLSNM from ECM_SERV_RULE a LEFT JOIN ECM_ROUTER_COND b on a.ROUTER_COND_ID = b.ROUTER_COND_ID LEFT JOIN ECM_ROUTER_COL e on b.ROUTER_COL_ID = e.ROUTER_COL_ID, ECM_SER_MTDINFO c,ECM_APP_SERINFO f where a.SER_MTD_ID = c.SER_MTD_ID and c.APP_SER_ID = f.APP_SER_ID AND a.SERV_RULE_ID in (${servRuleList})
select * from ECM_SERV_RULE where SERV_RULE_ID in (${appValRuleList})
select * from ECM_SERV_RULE where SERV_RULE_ID NOT in (${appValRuleList})
mapper.update:
update ECM_SERV_RULE
SERV_RULE_TYPE = #{servRuleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUTER_COND_ID = #{routerCondId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SER_MTD_ID = #{serMtdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RULE_STATUS = #{ruleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUTER_ARGS_POS = #{routerArgsPos,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ROUTER_ARGS_TYPE = #{routerArgsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERV_RULE_SELF = #{servRuleSelf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where SERV_RULE_ID = #{servRuleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into ECM_SERV_RULE
SERV_RULE_ID,
SERV_RULE_TYPE,
ROUTER_COND_ID,
SER_MTD_ID,
RULE_STATUS,
ROUTER_ARGS_POS,
ROUTER_ARGS_TYPE,
SERV_RULE_SELF,
